data.message: A lot of my friends are using the new little colorful box to put their post in. I love it but I don't have that option on my computer of Iphone...why is that? I'm not even sure what that is called. :-) Please advise. Thank you.

replies.message: Hi Debbie. Thanks for reaching out. You can only add a background color to a text post on Facebook for Android, but you'll be able to see background colors on Facebook for iOS and Android, the Facebook mobile site and Facebook on your computer. Please feel free to share your interest in the feature here: http://bit.ly/2lspkih. -Jon
Thank you Facebook, will we ever have this feature on IPhones or computers?
